title: What is YouTube Music? - YouTube Music Help
text: With the YouTube Music app, you can watch music videos, stay connected to artists you love, and discover music and podcasts to enjoy on all your devices. How to use and navigate the YouTube Music App to customize your listening experience Note: Users in select countries/regions may encounter different product experiences. YouTube Music with ads You can enjoy YouTube Music without a paid membership. Ad-supported YouTube Music includes: - On-demand playback for podcasts, songs, and music videos - Access to audio-only, background play, and downloads for most podcasts - Queuing, repeat, and unlimited skipping - The Samples tab - Music Tuner - Access to fan badges, like top listener YouTube Music Premium With YouTube Music Premium, you’ll get access to all of the features listed above. In addition, you’ll get exclusive membership benefits, including: - Background play for music - Music without ads - Audio-only music playback - Music downloads YouTube Music is currently available in these countries/regions. Learn more about YouTube Music Premium benefits, or sign up for a membership. YouTube Music Premium members may still experience ads on podcasts. Note: - Some features in YouTube Music are not available with supervised accounts. Learn more about our supervised experience on YouTube here. - YouTube Music Premium and YouTube Premium members may still see branding or promotions embedded in podcasts by the creator. If added or turned on by the creator, you may also find promotional links, shelves, and other features in and around content. Ads or promotions may also appear on Primetime Channels, or during live events streamed on YouTube, such as sporting events.
